TopicTitle: Mods that would make for a good IVA only game

Articles.Content:
What are some mods you guys could suggest to make the game better if I were to play it entirely without 3rd person, thus IVA only. Thus better inside views and panels, also if possible 1st person view for the kerbals to and cameras for seeing things like docking or placing stuff. And if you know a way to have IVA the default view or just disable 3rd person in flight, I would love to know how to do that.

Also two side questions any mod out there that allows building in space, thus making shipyards in orbit and on other worlds but without being to overpowered thus requires resources or something to make stuff? And also what would be some good mods that would help add more parts for ships and stations, but not be overkill to gameplay thus make it to easy to do things early on. Oh and almost forgot anything that can extend the number of hotkeys, since IVA limits me from right clicking and using a lot of stuff.

Also if you list a lot of mods, please tell me if they all work together or not and if possible that have a texture reduction pack or something include to (you know so game doesn't overload)

What I plan to get so far:

Deadly re-entry

Tac life support

FAR

Kerbal attachment system

(Most likely) B9

(Most likely) interstellar

Improved nav ball

Docking camera

infernal robotics

kerbal engineering

(maybe) KW Rocketry *forgot if it parts are overkill or not*
